Actions.Name: Double Team
Actions.Effects: The [name] and an ally in range 3 can each dash 1, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Call Out
Actions.Description: A foe in range must save or be shoved towards the [name] as far as possible, then gain hatred of the [name]. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 towards the [name].

Actions.Name: Lancer's Splendor
Actions.Description: The [name] takes a magnificent pose and gains aura 1. The [name] and allies in the aura are sturdy and deal bonus damage with all abilities.
